22-020HR.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from the Equity and Human Relations Commission Chair on the History of the Commission. Chair Gutierrez spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.A motion was made by Commissioner Camacho, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Cory Allen, Sharifa Batts, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Keyona Montgomery, Amy Eriksen and Alyssa GutierrezExcused: 3 - Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz and Chanel Smith2.

22-021HR.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from the Office of Equity on the Equity and Human Relations Commission’s ordinance amendments. Tony Viramontes, Office of Equity, spoke: and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Gutierrez spoke.Page 3 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 10:00 AMSATURDAY, AUGUST 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Flores spoke. Tony Viramontes, Office of Equity, spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke. Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Gutierrez and Alanah Grant, Office of Equity.Commissioner Flores spoke. Dr. Eduardo Lara spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke. A dialogue ensued between Chair Gutierrez and Dr. Eduardo Lara.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke.Bill Sive spoke.Tray Chamberlin spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Delgadillo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Cory Allen, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Keyona Montgomery and Alyssa GutierrezExcused: 3 - Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz and Chanel SmithPage 4 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 10:00 AMSATURDAY, AUGUST 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESAbsent: 2 - Sharifa Batts and Amy Eriksen3.

22-022HR.summary: Recommendation to receive and file an update from the Office of Equity on the Racial Equity and Reconciliation Initiative. Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint  presentation.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Chair Gutierrez spoke.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke.Dr. Eduardo Lara spoke.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Chair Gutierrez spoke. Bill Sive spoke. A dialogue ensued between Chair Gutierrez and Bill Sive.A motion was made by Commissioner Covington, seconded by Vice Chair Eriksen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Cory Allen, Sharifa Batts, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Keyona Montgomery, Amy Eriksen and Alyssa GutierrezExcused: 3 - Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz and Chanel SmithPage 5 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 10:00 AMSATURDAY, AUGUST 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESBREAK4.

22-023HR.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from the Equity and Human Relations Commission Vice Chair on Commission duties and expectations. Vice Chair Eriksen spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Butler spoke. A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Eriksen and Commissioner Butler.Commissioner Butts spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke. Chair Gutierrez spoke. Vice Chair Eriksen spoke. A dialogue ensued between Chair Gutierrez and Vice Chair Eriksen.A motion was made by Chair Gutierrez, seconded by Commissioner Butler, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Cory Allen, Sharifa Batts, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Keyona Montgomery, Amy Eriksen and Alyssa GutierrezExcused: 3 - Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz and Chanel Smith5.
